title: Onnanoko Gare!
description:
The main character is a high school girl who loves baseball and delicious rice. She has no interest in fashion and has lived a life unrelated as to be a girl. One day, her usual stylist granny, who had been going since childhood closed, so she decided to visit a beauty salon for the first time in her life. However, the beautician who was in charge of the base was an “Onee”… ?!

Also included in volume 1 [url=https://mangadex.org/title/17101]The King of Terror[/url] oneshot
